channel.title: Met Éireann Warnings
channel.description: Warnings issued by Met Éireann. This RSS feed displays valid warnings for land areas only. Sea area warnings will be added at a later date. Clicking the links, loads the CAP (Common Alerting Protocol) XML file. Note: Moderate means ‘Status Yellow’, Severe means ‘Status Orange’ and extreme means ‘Status Red’

item.title: Small Craft warning from Valentia to Slyne Head to Bloody Foreland
item.description: South to southwest winds will reach force 6.
item.author: forecasts@met.ie (Met Éireann)

item.title: Small Craft warning from Belfast Lough to Wicklow Head to Roches Point
item.description: South to southwest winds will increase to force 6 at times on Friday afternoon.
item.author: forecasts@met.ie (Met Éireann)

item.title: Small Craft warning from Valentia to Loop Head to Erris Head
item.description: Northwest winds will increase to force 6 on Saturday.
item.author: forecasts@met.ie (Met Éireann)
